name: First Contact (CthulhuGroup)
description:
In the game, you control an Alien ship in battle with another alien race after a bad first contact. You are attacked by the aliens defending their planet. Your objective is to get past the enemies and move onto the next planet. Either shoot them down or avoid them unless you want to be overrun and destroyed. 

Producer: Jared Bechthold

Designer: Morgan Tuttle

Artists: Morgan Tuttle, Octavio Martinez

Programmers: Jared Bechthold, Aakash Nayyar

Original Producer & Designers: Megan Chao & Morgan Tuttle

Sound from FreeSound.org by MakoFox
